content: Create a list of 20 words that end with 'ing'.

Sure! Here's a list of 20 words that end with "ing":

1. Running
2. Swimming
3. Dancing
4. Singing
5. Writing
6. Reading
7. Cooking
8. Painting
9. Hiking
10. Cycling
11. Skiing
12. Fishing
13. Shopping
14. Cleaning
15. Gardening
16. Photography
17. Exploring
18. Meditating
19. Laughing
20. Traveling

I hope this helps! If you need more words or have any other questions, feel free to ask.
